paragraphs.text: I'm a passionate Software Engineer who loves turning complex problems into elegant solutions. I've helped companies reduce costs by 80%, deliver projects 95% faster, and build systems that serve thousands of users worldwide.
Right now, I'm building amazing Shopify applications using modern web technologies. I use AI tools to work smarter, not harder, and I can build big features in just 2 days.
I work with Laravel, React, Vue.js, Python, and Node.js. I also handle DevOps, automation, and AI integration. My goal is always to create solutions that make a real difference for businesses.
